BKBR3.SA.summary: BK Brasil OperaÃ§Ã£o e Assessoria a Restaurantes S.A. develops, operates, and franchisees restaurants under the Burger King and POPEYES names in Brazil. As of September 30, 2020, the company had 857 Burger King restaurants; and 43 POPEYES restaurants. BK Brasil OperaÃ§Ã£o e Assessoria a Restaurantes S.A. was founded in 2011 and is headquartered in Barueri, Brazil.

MEAL3.SA.summary: International Meal Company AlimentaÃ§Ã£o S.A. engages in the sale of food and beverages to restaurants, snack bars, and coffee shops in Brazil, Panama, Colombia, and the United States. It operates through Shopping Malls, Airports, Highways, United States of America, and Others segments.
